section.title: Services and the [keystone_authtoken]
section.para: Because most OpenStack services must access the Identity Service, you must configure the IP address of the keystone server to be able to access it. You must also configure the admin_tenant_name, admin_user, and admin_password options for each service to work.
Generally, this section looks like this:
section.programlisting: [keystone_authtoken] auth_host = 127.0.0.1 auth_port = 35357 auth_protocol = http admin_tenant_name = %SERVICE_TENANT_NAME% admin_user = %SERVICE_USER% admin_password = %SERVICE_PASSWORD%
section.para: The debconf system helps users configure the auth_host, admin_tenant_name, admin_user and admin_password options.
